definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy
to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

sentences.english: Staring through the window, I saw the snake like lighting crawling on the gray and heavy sky.
sentences.chinese: 透過窗，只見那電蛇在黑沉沉的天空蜿蜒。

sentences.english: The sky began to darken as the storm approached.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雨來臨時天空變得黑沉沉的。

sentences.english: The sea was sullen and the sky heavy as lead. The storm would break any time.
sentences.chinese: 大海昏暗，天空黑沉沉，暴風雨隨時就要來臨。

sentences.english: The heavy rain crazy black sky drop from the clouds, like the collapse of.
sentences.chinese: 大雨瘋狂地從天而降，黑沉沉的天就像要崩塌下來。

sentences.english: The moon is the finest sliver of pale gold in the blackness lying over the Songshan mountains.
sentences.chinese: 淡金色的月牙掛在黑沉沉的嵩山上。

sentences.english: His glance again wandered away to the darkened street.
sentences.chinese: 他的視線又轉至黑沉沉的街上。

sentences.english: It was going to be a dark and stormy night.
sentences.chinese: 這將會是個黑沉沉的暴雨夜。

definition: pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3
